GEO.H.CHAPMAN
SOUTH SAN FRANCISCO
LAND AND IMPROVEMENT COMPANY
INDUSTRIAL AND RESIDENTIAL PROPERTIES
January 10, 1927 •
SAN
MERCHANTS EXCHANGE BOIDING
SOUTH SAN FRANGIDGO
GRAND AND LINDEN AVENCES
Mr. P. R. Thompson, Manager,
Chamber of Commerce,
South San Francisco,
Califoris.
Dear Sir:
With reference to the establishment
of a tempor ary
landing field at South San
Franci sco, pending the selection
of a permanent field, we are agreeable to permitting you to
offer to the City of
San Francisco for temporary use
the site
west of the new Bay Shore Highway,
exact descriptim of
which you are familiar,
at a price of $900.00 as rental for
period ending December 31, 1927, without any obligation
part of the City of San Francisco to accept as
& pe r-
manent field the location which has been offered to them.
We
also sgree to extend to the City of San Fran-
cisco an option on the 221.4 acres
of land esst of the Bay
Shore Highway,
designated as Field No. 2 in the Report of
the
San Francisco Chamber
of Commerce,
at a pric
of $1784.10
per
sore, or & total considerati on of $395,000.00.
The cost of this option to be 1% of the purchase
price the hi ta ca
which amount is to be paid to
San Francisco
on 1.950.00 in the event that the opt ion
is not exercised wi thin the period stated; namely, December
31, 1921 •
purchased at
17, how
however, the
option is exercised,
and the land
on the purchase price of the
price n the and
the option price
will be applied
Very truly fores
GENERAL MANAGER
